Sql.CDATA: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.PMSummaryByBIV AS select c.CompanyID, c.ContractID, dbo.F_UsedIncome (c.CompanyID, c.ContractID) as UsedIncome, dbo.F_UsedExpense (c.CompanyID, c.ContractID,default,default,default) as UsedExpense, SUM( case when b.Type = 'I' then b.CuryRevisedAmount else 0 end ) BudgetIncome, SUM( case when b.Type = 'E' then b.CuryRevisedAmount else 0 end ) BudgetExpense from Contract c Left Join PMBudget b on c.CompanyID = b.CompanyID and c.ContractID = b.ProjectID group by c.CompanyID, c.ContractID
